name: COVID19SNOMEDValueSetForAlzheimersDisease
title: COVID19 SNOMED Value Set for Alzheimer's Disease
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains terms related to alzheimer's disease and is listed as a neurologic disorder on the CDC SARS-CoV-2 hospitalization surveillance case report form.),(Data Element Scope: ),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes alzheimer's disease.),(Exclusion Criteria: )
